import { Grid } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import '../styles/NewRoutine.css' const NewRoutine = ({ API_URL, onShow, routine, setRoutine, microcycles, setMicrocycles, sessionsDay, setSessionsDay }) => { const emptyMicrocycle = useState( { number: 1 } ) const addSession = (microcycle) => { } return (
{microcycles.map((microcycle, index) => (
Microciclo {microcycle.number}
{sessionsDay.filter((sessionDay) => sessionDay.microcycleId === microcycle.number) .map(session => (
{session.day}
)) }
))}
) } export default NewRoutine
